mapper.select: select g.id, g.sn, g.name, g.description, g.created_at, g.updated_at, r.id as roleId, r.sn as roleSn, r.name as roleName, r.description as roleDescription from groups g left join group_roles gr on g.id = gr.group_id left join roles r on gr.role_id = r.id where g.sn=#{sn}

select g.id, g.sn, g.name, g.description, g.created_at, g.updated_at, r.id as roleId, r.sn as roleSn, r.name as roleName, r.description as roleDescription from groups g left join group_roles gr on g.id = gr.group_id left join roles r on gr.role_id = r.id order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}

select g.id, g.sn, g.name, g.description, g.created_at, g.updated_at, r.id as roleId, r.sn as roleSn, r.name as roleName, r.description as roleDescription from groups g left join group_roles gr on g.id = gr.group_id left join roles r on gr.role_id = r.id where g.name like #{keyword} or g.sn like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
